name: places/ChIJty9pHrZZwokR5IDEU6DAg_8
formattedAddress: 59 Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 59 Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I used to love this brand and recommended it to others.  Never again.  I bought three dresses during their sale, but received 2 of one of the styles.  Clearly this was a mistake, either mine or theirs, but a mistake none the less.  They would do nothing for me, I got a form email saying that sale items are final.  So now I have 2 of the same dress.  The phone number listed on the order form and on their web site rings through to an insurance agency.  Tucker is becoming a scam.  The quality has really declined as well.

originalText.text: HORRIBLE customer service experience!!!!!  Clothing not worth the money!!  Wore the dress ONCE!!! And had it cleaned ONCE. and it didn’t hold the color. Since it was past the return timeframe they would not replace the dress…even though I explained I’d been traveling due to a death in the family.   WILL NEVER BUY FROM THESE GUYS AGAIN. DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!

originalText.text:
Tucker’s customer service and order fulfillment has been horrible. My order was placed on 8/14.
I was originally told it would be shipped on 9/14 and was not happy about that - the items I ordered were intended for late summer wear and not getting them until September was going to mean I missed out on the season. In addition, I was going on a trip leaving 9/16 and wanted to bring the items with me. I reached out 3 times to see if there was any way the order could be sent so I could receive it by 9/15 (so I could bring on my trip) but never received a reply. I finally got a notice saying that items would arrive on 9/28 - 6 weeks after the order date and 2 weeks after the originally delayed fulfillment date. These clothes are really expensive - if I’m going to spend more than $700 on three items, I expect way better service.

originalText.text:
I was so surprised to read the negative reviews about the customer service that I had to write about my experience.  Thankfully, my experiences have been stellar. From viewing the website to ordering to "oohing" and "aahing" about the quality of the blouses and shirts....Once I had a question and the CS rep was lovely.

Tucker is one of the few sites I order from online knowing that I cannot just pop back into the store to return.  Thus far, I have not had the need to!

originalText.text: Awful dress. Cheap material. Way oversized. A sack.

text.text: Awful dress. Cheap material. Way oversized. A sack.
